MiÅÃ¤r Tatars (or Mishers) are a group of Tatars speaking a dialect of the [[Tatar language]]. They are descendants of [[Cuman]]-[[Kipchaks]] in the Middle [[Oka River]] area and Meschiora where they mixed with the local [[Uralic peoples|Uralic]] tribes. Nowadays they live in [[Chelyabinsk Oblast|Chelyabinsk]], [[Tambov Oblast|Tambov]], [[Penza Oblast|Penza]], [[Ryazan Oblast|Ryazan]], [[Nizhegorodskaya]] oblasts of Russia and in [[Bashkortostan]] and [[Mordovia]]. They lived near and along the Volga River, in Tatarstan.
+
MiÅÃ¤r Tatars (or Mishers) are a group of Tatars speaking a dialect of the [[Tatar language]]. They are descendants of [[Kipchaks]] in the Middle [[Oka River]] area and Meschiora where they mixed with the local [[Uralic peoples|Uralic]] tribes. Nowadays they live in [[Chelyabinsk Oblast|Chelyabinsk]], [[Tambov Oblast|Tambov]], [[Penza Oblast|Penza]], [[Ryazan Oblast|Ryazan]], [[Nizhegorodskaya]] oblasts of Russia and in [[Bashkortostan]] and [[Mordovia]]. They lived near and along the Volga River, in Tatarstan.
